forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. SSE winds at 5 to 10 km/h, increasing to 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early then thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning then thundershowers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
